name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
title: "Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi
desc: To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Sangonomiya Kokomi to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Kurage's Oath
skills.desc: This character gains <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro Application and summons 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Bake-Kurage.

skills.name: Nereid's Ascension
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro DMG. Heals all allied characters for 1 point. This character gains <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Ceremonial Garment.
